title: 5.9 SGPA what to do? :(
content:
Hey seniors, I got my first semester results yesterday and got very bad sgpa. My parents are very disappointed but luckily they still believe in me. 
Honestly it’s my fault, I didn’t real put that much effort, but also our semester was 3 months long with 6 months worth of syllabus.
Fucked it up badly, got only 5.9GPA.
Can I increase gpa to 7.5+ in the coming semesters? Can you give me some tips/advice/motivation? I’m in a really bad place rn, and I don’t wanna waste my parent’s money

comments.body: Ok so what u got is pretty low. By the end of 6th sem try to have a CGPA something above 7 which should be the bare minimum I feel. I have seen a lot of folks who score 6 sgpa in 1st sem ending up with 8+ cgpa by the end of their course. Also word of advice: 1st year supposed to be chill. 2nd year and 3rd dont mess up. Most ideal situation after 6 sems is 8+ cgpa but it takes a good amount of effort. Even if u dont get that 7+ is a must if u wanna be placed.
I realised sulking is useless now, this is a wale up call. I am ready to a lot of effort into increasing my cgpa. Thanks for your advice!!
Bro lmao i was in low 5's cgpa up until 6th sem, I got it to 6.5+ in 2 sems with lower credits as well. You can easily bump it to even 8+, so much time is there. Don't sweat it.
Thankss man!! You have no idea how much this means to me rn
